subject: Science
title: Why You Need Sleep
description: A short lesson to help you apply Why You Need Sleep.

hook.text: Go without sleep for 11 days and you'll hallucinate, lose memory, and nearly collapse.

buildup.text: During sleep, the brain replays the day's events, strengthening important memories.

discovery.text: The glymphatic system flushes toxic waste from the brain â€” but only during deep sleep.

twist.text: One of those toxins is beta-amyloid â€” linked to Alzheimer's disease. Poor sleep accumulates it.

climax.text: No animal has evolved to survive without sleep. Even fruit flies sleep.

punchline.text: Sleep isn't rest. It's your brain's nightly maintenance and trash removal.

quiz.question: What does the glymphatic system do during sleep?
options: Flushes toxic waste from the brain
